Changelog
=========

2.0.2 – 2014-09-22
------------------

- [CHANGE] Updated to mosaik-api 2.0.


2.0.1 – 2014-06-26
------------------

- [CHANGE] Adopted latest changes of the mosaik low-level API.


2.0 – 2014-03-26
----------------

- Updated API implementation for mosaik2.


1.0 – 2014-01-30
----------------

- Initial release.
